casebody.data:
In the Matter of Talib W. ABDUR-RASHID, Appellant,
v.
NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, et al., Respondents. In the Matter of Samir Hashmi, Appellant,
v.
New York City Police Department, et al., Respondents. 2018-62 Court of Appeals of New York. January 11, 2018

**580*803Motion by New York City Council's Black, Latino and Asian Caucus for leave to appear amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted only to the extent that the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
